text:
e="preserve">Robin François (Robbe) De Hert (20 September 1942 – 24 August 2020) was an English-born Belgian movie director. He was born in Farnborough, Hampshire. His best known movies were "De Witte van Sichem", "Brylcream Boulevard" and "Het Been".
De Hert died on 24 August 2020 from diabetes-related problems, aged 77.
